Half-life time from fit for 224-Ra: 4.08 +/- 0.17 days
Half-life of 224-Ra is actually 3.5 days, according to PubChem.
Uncertainties on fitting coefficients (fit to f(x) = c1 + c2*x):
∆c1 = 0.0339477544244211
∆c2 = 0.00695008119420514

The actual value and the measured differ by:
lambda = |t_exp - t_measured|/Δt_exp =3.48  
So they do not agree within the uncertainities.

Covariance matrix:

   0.00115  -0.000178 
 -0.000178   4.83e-05
